titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on 1-(3-Sulfopropyl) pyridinium hydroxide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the existing suspension of duty on 1-(3-sulfopropyl) pyridinium hydroxide.
